key.name: enable-debugging
key.description: Enable or disable debug messages in the extension.

key.name: minimum-size-trigger
key.description: Minimum window size (NxN) triggering mouse-follows-focus events.

key.name: motion-event-timeout
key.description: How long before resetting the mouse motion event detection timeout.

key.name: top-bar-height
key.description: Do not track mouse on the first N pixels from the top (0 to disable).

key.name: bottom-bar-height
key.description: Do not track mouse on the last N pixels from the bottom (0 to disable).
